content: I'm planning to start a new quilt for my niece's birthday, which is in 6 weeks. Can you help me with some fabric calculation and layout suggestions? By the way, I just organized all my fabric scraps and threads, and I realized I need to restock on some essential colors like white, black, and navy blue. Oh, and I recently got a gorgeous merino wool yarn on sale at the yarn store last month, but that's for a different project.
